attributes.action: recognise Adam Hart Davis in the New Years Honours list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Historian, scientist, photographer, writer and broadcaster, Dr Adam Hart Davis is one of most recognised people on British television today. 

He is also one of the most talented. 

It is hard to know where to start with his achievements. He is probably best know for his presenting work on many successful and popular educational series, such as 'Tomorrow's World', 'What The Romans Did For Us', 'Local Heroes' and 'Science Shack', presenting history and science with tremendous enthusiasm, and in a very informative and interesting way. 

We feel that he should be recognised for his services to educational broadcasting.
